DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To investigate whether visceral adipose tissue ( VAT ) adipokines contribute early sign cardiovascular disease , mean coronary artery calcification ( CAC ) diastolic dysfunction type 1 diabetes ( T1DM ) . Research Design & Methods : A cross-sectional study T1DM patient without history cardiovascular disease . CAC VAT measure use CT scan . CAC score use Agatston method . Echocardiography perform assess contractile abnormality . Serum level adipocytokines ( adiponectin , leptin , IL-6 TNF-a ) measure use ELISA assay .
DOC.brief_title: Relation Visceral Fat Associated Cytokines With Early Cardiovascular Complications Type 1 Diabetes .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To investigate whether visceral adipose tissue ( VAT ) adipokines contribute early sign cardiovascular disease , mean coronary artery calcification ( CAC ) diastolic dysfunction type 1 diabetes ( T1DM ) . Patients & Methods : Adult T1DM patient , age 18-75 year , regularly attend out-patient diabetes clinic Antwerp University Hospital recruit start June 2011 . Patients diabetes duration ≥5 year general good health include . Exclusion criteria history major adverse cardiovascular event ( myocardial infarction , stroke ) , cardiovascular complaint , pregnancy glomerular filtration rate ≤30 ml/min/1.73 m² . All participant sign inform consent form . This study conduct accordance amend Declaration Helsinki . The research protocol approve Antwerp University Hospital Ethics committee ( UZA 11/31/224 , Belgian registration number : B30020111874 ) . Anthropometric measurement : All measurement perform morning overnight fast . Height measure near 0.5 cm use wall-mounted stadiometer , weight measure use balance beam scale subject underwear . Waist circumference measure mid-level low rib margin iliac crest . Body composition assess bio-impedance analysis ( BIA ) fat mass percentage calculate use formula Deurenberg . Visceral abdominal adipose tissue ( VAT ) subcutaneous abdominal adipose tissue ( SAT ) determine 64-slice computerized tomography ( CT ) scan L4-L5 level ( slice thickness 0.6mm ) . Blood pressure take standardized method ( Dynamap ) 10-min rest , mean four measurement use . Hypertension define blood pressure ≥130/85 mmHg antihypertensive medication intake patient . Presence metabolic syndrome evaluate use International Diabetes Federation criterion . Subjects classify metabolic syndrome ≥3 follow criterion meet : ( 1 ) increase waist circumference ( men ≥94 cm , woman ≥80 cm ) , ( 2 ) hypertriglyceridemia ( ≥150 mg/dl=1.7 mmol/l ) , ( 3 ) low HDL cholesterol ( < 40 mg/dl=1.03 mmol/l men < 50 mg/dl=1.29 mmol/l woman ) , ( 4 ) high blood pressure ( ≥130/85 mmHg ) , ( 5 ) high fast glucose ( ≥100 mg/dl ) . Insulin resistance determine use inverse estimate glucose disposal rate ( eGDR ) , calculate use formula : : eGDR= 21.158 + ( - 0.09 * waist circumference ) + ( - 3.407 * hypertension ) + ( - 0.551 * HbA1c ) . Laboratory measurement : HbA1C determine high performance liquid chromatography Adams™ A1c HA-8160 8180 , Arkray - Menarini instrument ( Zaventem , Belgium ; reference range : 4.8-6.0 % ) . A mean four annual determination A1C use assess overall metabolic control past two year . Plasma Serum level creatinin , total cholesterol , HDL cholesterol triglyceride measure Vitros 750 XRC ( Ortho Clinical Diagnostic , Johnson & Johnson , Buckinghamshire , UK ) Dimension Vista 1500 System ( Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics , Huizingen , Belgium ) reagent manufacturer ( REF K1270A creatinin , REF K1027 total cholesterol , REF K3048A HDL-cholesterol , REF K2069 triglyceride ) . HDL-C measure Hitachi 912 ( Roche Diagnostics , Mannheim , Germany ) . Serum creatinine measure enzymatic method Vitros 750 ( Ortho Clinical Diagnostic , Beerse , Belgium ) . The glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) estimate use abbreviate MDRD formula , include correction factor 0.742 woman . Plasma HMW adiponectin concentration measure enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) ( EZHMWA-64K , Millipore , analytical sensitivity 0.5 ng/ml , intra-assay coefficient variation [ CV ] 7.47 % ) . Leptin measure use ELISA kit ( HU Leptin kit , KAC2281 , Life Technologies , sensitivity 3.5 pg/ml , intra-assay CV 5.75 % ) . TNF-α assayed use ELISA ( HU TNF alpha kit , KHC3011 , Life Technologies , sensitivity 1.7 pg/ml , intra-assay CV 6.38 % ) IL-6 concentration measure use ELISA ( HU IL-6 Chemiluminescence Elisa kit , KHC0069 , Life Technologies , sensitivity 0.25 pg/ml , intra-assay CV 5.37 % ) . Assessment complication : Each subject assess presence severity complication . 24h-Urinary albumin measure nephelometry Dimension Vista 1500 System ( Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics , Huizingen , Belgium ) reagent manufacturer ( REF K7062 ) . use Behring Nephelometer II ( Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics Products , Marburg , Germany ) . Microalbuminuria define urinary albumin excretion exceed 20 µg/min . Both carotid artery examine use carotid duplex scanner ( General Electrics , Vivid 7 Pro ) , equip 8-Mhz high-resolution probe . A 64-slice non-contrast multidetector CT scan coronary artery perform measure coronary artery calcification ( CAC ) ( Lightspeed , VCT ; General Electric Medical Systems , Waukesha , Wis , Milwaukee , USA ) . Scoring do one skilled radiologist ( R. Salgado ) , blind subject case file . Typical image parameter : tube voltage 100 kv ; current intensity 310 mA ; rotation time 500 m ; detector collimation 64 x 0.625 mm . Scan data reconstruct 75 % cardiac cycle QRS complex . The radiation dose calcium score range 1.3-1.7 mSv . CAC quantify ( Agatston score ) mean dedicated software application ( SmartScore , AW ) . The Agatston score product CAC area time density . A score < 10 consider normal . A score > 200 strong predictor CVD risk . Standard 2-dimensional Doppler Echocardiography ( iE-33 Philips , The Netherlands ) perform single cardiologist blind clinical status study participant . Briefly , leave ventricular function assess parasternal long axis M-mode modify biplane Simpson method . Diastolic function determine take account follow parameter : mitral inflow , pulmonary vein inflow signal mitral annular tissue Doppler ( tD ) velocity end expiratory cycle accord ASE recommendation .
DOC.criteria: type 1 diabetic patient ( criteria diagnosis American Diabetes Association diabetes duration ≥5 year general good health experience major adverse cardiovascular event ( myocardial infarction , stroke ) cardiovascular complaint pregnancy estimate glomerular filtration ≤ 30ml/min/1.73 m²
